live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.

We are awaiting restoration of power to our equipment serving the affected areas. Local power companies will be working overnight and into the morning, and once power is restored, services in these areas should begin working.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51208.summary: Some customers in the Sunalta area of CAlgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51208.title: Jul 2 - Calgary (Sunalta) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
